title: A-Player SDR / AI Growth Specialist (B2B Mid-Market Outreach)
description:
I am building the leading AI Operations consultancy for mid-market companies ($10M–$100M revenue). We help CEOs move from traditional, manual operations to AI-native "eVTOL" organizations.



I am looking for a top-tier Sales Development Representative (SDR) who is a "Hunter" by nature. You are not just looking for a paycheck; you are looking for a win. You will be responsible for breaking into the C-suite, identifying the "Capacity Ceiling" in their business, and booking qualified discovery calls.



What You’ll Be Doing:



Multi-Channel Dominance: You have the freedom to win. Whether it’s LinkedIn outreach,
 drip campaigns (Apollo/GoHighLevel), or high-volume cold calling—you do what it takes to get the meeting.



Executive Outreach: You will be speaking directly with Founders, CEOs, COOs, and Directors. You must be comfortable challenging their status quo and speaking the language of ROI.



Lead Qualification: You won't just book "any" meeting. You will use our proprietary Framework to qualify prospects and drive them toward our AI Readiness Scorecard.



Self-Initiative: You don't wait for instructions. You are creative, you pivot when a script isn't working, and you treat this pipeline like it’s your own business.



The Ideal Candidate:



A-Type Personality: You are strong-headed, resilient, and "No" is just a request for more information.



Hunger for Success: You have a deep-seated need to win and exceed targets.



B2B Experience: At least 3+ years experience in B2B sales/lead gen, preferably targeting the US/UK/Western markets.



Technical Literacy: Experience with 
, GoHighLevel, and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.



Communication: Near-native English with the confidence to handle high-level business conversations.



Why Join Us?



Attractive Base Salary: We pay for talent and results.



Performance Incentives: High-commission structure for booked meetings and bonuses for completed assessments.



Strategic Growth: You will be at the forefront of the AI revolution, learning our proprietary transformation frameworks that are shaping the future of business.



How to Apply:

Don't just send a generic resume. Send me a brief 1-minute video or a 2-paragraph "Pitch" telling me about a time you turned a "Hard No" into a "Signed Contract."



Include the phrase "eVTOL Lead" in your subject line so I know you’ve read this.

Job Title: Customer Service



Job Description:

A Customer Service Specialist is responsible for ensuring a positive and satisfactory experience for customers interacting with the organization. They handle customer inquiries, complaints, and requests, providing efficient and effective solutions. Their primary focus is on maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction and building strong customer relationships.



Responsibilities:

Responding to customer inquiries through various communication channels (phone,
, chat, or in-person).

Resolving customer complaints or issues in a timely and professional manner.

Providing product or service information to customers and assisting with their purchasing decisions.

Processing customer orders, returns, or exchanges.

Troubleshooting technical or product-related problems.

Escalating complex or unresolved issues to appropriate departments or supervisors.

Maintaining accurate and up-to-date customer records and interactions in the customer relationship management (CRM) system.

Following up with customers to ensure their satisfaction and to build long-term relationships.

Collaborating with other teams or departments to resolve customer issues or improve the overall customer experience.



Skills and Qualifications:



Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.

Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution abilities.

Empathy and patience when dealing with customer concerns.

Ability to handle and prioritize multiple customer inquiries simultaneously.

Proficiency in using customer service software or CRM systems.

Product knowledge and understanding of company policies and procedures.

Adaptability and flexibility in a fast-paced and dynamic customer service environment.

title: Short Form Video Editor work with HayGen (Reels/Shorts + Captions + CTA Graphics)
description:
I create AI-generated talking head videos using HeyGen and need a reliable editor to finalize and publish short-form content.



I will provide the completed HeyGen video output. Your role is to:



• Add a title overlay (I will provide exact sample to duplicate)

• Add a Subscribe button at a specific timestamp (one graphic used consistently across all videos)

• Apply my branded lower-third title to the bottom of the screen (sample provided)

• Format vertically (9:16, 1080x1920)

• Export optimized for Reels/YouTube Shorts

• Upload finalized videos to Later for scheduling



Captions are handled natively by YouTube Shorts, Instagram, and
 — you do NOT need to add subtitles.



Volume:

Approximately 160 videos per month (up to 60 seconds each).



Turnaround:

48–72 hours for batches.



This is ongoing monthly work.



Must be experienced in:

• Short-form vertical editing

HayGen video editing to make it look very realistic

• CapCut, Canva, or similar

• Consistent branding application

• Fast batch workflow



Please include samples of vertical Reels or Shorts you’ve edited with HayGen 

If no sample of HayGen is included, do NOT apply.



Make the subject line: HayGen edited video included

title: SEO Specialist - Wix SEO & Generative Engine Optimization Specialist
description:
ABOUT ROBIII



Robiii is Canada’s leading toy company on YouTube, with over 500,000 followers. We create educational and engaging products that support learning and creativity, especially for children with learning differences like ADHD and dyslexia.



We’re a small, mission-driven team that values resourcefulness, autonomy, and results. As we continue to grow, we’re looking for an SEO Specialist who can help us increase our visibility on Google and optimize our website for both search engines and AI-driven platforms like ChatGPT and Perplexity.



This role is part-time and focused on improving our website SEO on Wix. If you also have experience with AI Optimization (AIO/GEO), that’s a strong plus.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



MAIN FOCUS – SEO OPTIMIZATION



Audit and optimize our Wix website for search visibility



Research and select relevant keywords to drive targeted traffic



Optimize on-page elements (titles, meta descriptions, headers, internal linking)



Improve image SEO (file naming, alt text, compression)



Implement structured data/schema when needed



Track performance using tools like Google Search Console and provide reports



BONUS – AI / GEO OPTIMIZATION



Explore strategies to improve visibility in AI-driven search tools (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini)



Recommend content structures (FAQs, summaries, schema) that increase AI search inclusion



OPTIONAL – WIX PAGE CREATION



Build or update small pages directly in Wix when needed



WHO YOU ARE



We’re looking for someone who is experienced, detail-oriented, and results-driven. You know how to create strategies that actually move rankings, and you have a track record of SEO results to prove it. You’re independent, reliable, and proactive — the kind of person who can spot opportunities for improvement and act on them without waiting for instructions.



REQUIREMENTS



Proven experience in SEO with measurable results (please provide examples or case studies)



Strong understanding of keyword research and search intent



Experience with on-page optimization, internal linking, and technical SEO basics



Familiarity with Wix platform (or ability to learn it quickly)



Knowledge of image SEO (alt text, file naming, compression)



Comfortable working part-time and independently



Strong communication skills



(Optional) Experience with AI Optimization (AIO/GEO)



HOW TO APPLY



Send your CV and a short description of your SEO experience + proof of results (screenshots, case studies, or links) to 



Subject line: Application – SEO Specialist





***We only reply to application sent to our
 ***



HOW TO APPLY



Send your CV and a short description of your SEO experience + proof of results (screenshots, case studies, or links) to 



Subject line: Application – SEO Specialist

title: Legal Case Administrator
description:
The A
 Guys, a premier personal injury law firm based in Los Angeles, California, is seeking a full-time, remote Case Administrator to join our team.

We are looking for someone who is highly organized, proactive, and detail-oriented. This role requires strong communication skills, excellent English, and the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently to keep cases moving forward without delays.

2+ years of Virtual Assistant (VA) or BPO experience

2+ years of strong verbal communication

Excellent English communication skills (written & verbal)

Highly organized with strong time management skills

Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks at once

dical providers

title: Legal Assistant
description:
Seeking a Legal Assistant



Do you want to help people get to their happily ever after?

We are an entrepreneurial family law and property litigation firm that is on track for aggressive growth and we need an experienced legal assistant to join our team and work directly with the owner, attorneys and other staff members to support the team and help our clients.

We want to be known for helping our clients come out of an extremely emotional process feeling as though they are a better person, in a better position, and that they had a team behind them that really cared and fought for them. We are growing fast, and we need an attorney who can hit the ground running.

This position will be responsible for important work, including:



· Maintain Attorneys’ calendars;

· Calendar court, discovery and filing deadlines;

· Draft
s and correspondences to clients, court personnel and 3rd parties;

· Review, file and respond to
s and facsimiles daily;

· Maintain electronic client files in MyCase;

· Monitor and assist with workflows;

· Assist in drafting and filing of routine pleadings such as Notices of Appearance, Notices

of Leaves of Absence;

Conduct electronic filing of Court documents;

· Assist with Motion assembly

· Document management

· Small tasks on an as-needed basis



If these statements appeal to you, then you may be our Legal Assistant:

- You smile when you answer the phone

- You are an amazing scheduler with a sickening degree of attention to detail

- You are very good with calendars, e-mail, spreadsheets, word processing, and the internet

- Your middle name is “No Drama”

- You are an awesome juggler of tasks and can change gears quickly

- You are a problem solver and a solution seeker

- You care about making am impactful and positive difference in the lives of others



 The ideal candidate will be able to take initiative on work that needs to be done and complete tasks with minimal hand-holding.



Prepare a cover letter with no more than TWO paragraphs and a closing sentence. In the first paragraph explain what you believe are the 3 most important qualities needed in someone who works with family law clients and why you believe they are the most important qualities. In the second paragraph, explain why you applied to this particular employment opportunity.



Do not send your resume through this website.
 your resume and cover letter in PDF format to 
 subject line of the
 should your last name (all caps), followed by the position you are applying for in lower case, followed by one word that you would use to describe yourself in all caps. [For example: SMITH paralegal AWESOME] We look forward to reviewing your application. ad. As a closing sentence please write, “I have read the instructions contained in the job posting and have followed the instructions.”

title: Experienced Digital Marketing (AU hours) - Longterm
description:
TITLE:

Digital Marketing Coordinator (aka; Advertising, Media & Communications Manager)



BUSINESS:

Our business is a dream to work for…

• We provide content promotion and lead generation to global personalities and professionals.

• Our focus (and soon to be your focus) is to help global personalities and professionals succeed by driving attention to their most powerful educational content and drive leads to their business to increase their sales. To do this, we recruit the best video editors, graphic designers, content writers, paid ad media buyers and more.



ROLE:

This role is perfect for you, if…

• You are looking to work in a role of an experienced Digital Marketing Coordinator

• You want to work on multiple clients marketing campaigns, working with media buyers/graphic designers/video editors/content writers

• You have confidence and enjoy speaking professionally with clients (written and verbal)

• You want to work remotely, full time (40 hours) a week - Monday to Friday

• You’re interested in Day Shift hours, during Melbourne, Australia business hours

• You have a University Level Education

• And, you already have advanced skills in building (or running) paid digital advertising campaigns



RESPONSIBILITIES:

Your responsibilities will include…

• Build and execute comprehensive project plans for marketing campaigns

• Coordinate with internal and external delivery teams, including clients, graphic designers, content writers, video editors, content writers, media buyers and developers

• Enforce end-to-end message congruency from the ad creative, ad copy, landing page copy, resource, etc

• Define the #1 pain point being solved by the campaign and ensure it hits the desired target market

• Identify project issues, roadblocks or missing requirements quickly and resolve proactively

• If necessary, re-write and optimise content - such as; ad copy, funnel copy,
 copy, etc

• Ensure a campaign has the highest chance of success prior to going live

• Document and handover all campaign, funnel and ad resources to media buyer for them to manage post go-live

We will provide training on how to execute each item above, as long as you are the type of person who has the will to learn and master it.



REQUIREMENTS:

To be considered for this position, you are required to:

• You need to have a proven solid work experience as a digital marketing coordinator of at least 2+ years

• You need to have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 processor and 8gb of RAM

• You need to have a 2nd computer screen in your home office

• You need to have a fast and reliable Internet connection, with access to a back-up

• You have leadership abilities, decision-making skills, and problem-solving capabilities.

• You have proven experience as a content writer in lead generation, or project manager in a lead generation, or operated in a digital marketing environment.

• You have a results-driven mindset with a commitment to achieving project objectives.

• You have a strong attention to detail and highly organised

• You have a friendly, upbeat and team focused attitude

• Most importantly, you desire to learn and obtain new responsibilities



SOFTWARE & TOOLS:

• Zoom - video meetings (internal team and client communication)

• Loom - screen recording software (internal team and client communication)

• Slack - internal communication tool

• ClickUp - task management software

• Google
 (gmail)

• Google Drive

• Google Sheets



How to Apply: Attached your CV link with your cover letter

title: Social Media Manager (Instagram & TikTok) for Ace & Taylor
description:
About Us

Ace & Taylor is a fast-growing D2C e-commerce brand selling premium hair tools across Europe. We focus on high-performing short-form video content and daily organic posting on Instagram and TikTok to grow brand awareness, trust, and sales.



We are currently active in The Netherlands and Belgium and expanding across Europe.



What You’ll Do (Your Core Responsibility)

You will fully own our organic social media presence on Instagram and TikTok.

This means you are responsible for planning, posting, captions, stories, community management (DMs & comments), and daily execution.



This is NOT just scheduling content.

We are looking for someone who can run our social media channels independently and consistently.



Your Weekly Tasks

- Post 1–2 times per day on Instagram & TikTok

- Create strong captions & CTAs (engaging, on-brand, conversion-focused)

- Post daily stories (product usage, UGC, behind the scenes, promos)

- Reply to DMs & comments within 24 hours

- Plan and manage the content calendar

- Repurpose existing videos into social posts

- Coordinate with video editors & creative team

- Track basic performance (views, engagement) and report weekly



We Are Looking For Someone Who

- Has proven experience managing Instagram & TikTok for brands

- Understands short-form content and social media trends

- Can work independently without daily hand-holding

- Is proactive: asks questions if something is unclear

- Is highly organized and consistent with daily posting

- Understands brand tone and can adapt copy per platform



Important (Read Carefully – This Filters Out 90% of Bad Applicants)

We post daily. This role requires consistency and ownership.

If you:

- Miss posting deadlines

- Are inconsistent

- Don’t reply to DMs/comments on time

- Don’t ask questions when confused

- Or treat this as “just scheduling posts”



This will clearly not be a fit.



Paid Test Task (Mandatory)

Before we hire you, we will ask you to complete a paid test task:

- Create a 7-day content plan

- Write captions for 5 posts

- Propose story ideas

This helps both sides see if we’re a good match.



Long-Term Opportunity

If this works well, this can become a long-term collaboration with consistent work, growing responsibility, and higher pay over time.

title: E-commerce Video Editor (with AI experience)
description:
We are looking for a skilled, performance-driven E-commerce  (Hair & Beauty/Hairstyling Industry) Video Editor to join our team full-time. Here, you aren’t just an editor. You are a creative strategist who understands direct-response marketing. You know how to CREATE scroll-stopping creatives that drive measurable results across Meta, TikTok, and YouTube. This role is not just about editing, t’s about understanding conversion psychology, hooks, pacing, and creative strategy.



In this role, you will blend traditional high-end editing with cutting-edge AI tools to produce winning ads at scale. If you are obsessed with conversion psychology, pacing, hooks, and staying ahead of the curve with new tech, we want to meet you.



Responsibilities:



1. Edit high-converting short-form video ads (UGC, product demos, testimonials, comparison ads)

2. Develop strong hooks within the first 3 seconds to maximize retention

3. Add captions, motion graphics, sound design, and platform-native elements

4. Collaborate with our media buyer and creative strategists to iterate based on performance data

5. Organize and manage project files efficiently

6. Generate AI-assisted creatives using image and video generation tools





AI & Creative Technology Requirements:



1. Experience writing effective AI prompts for video and image generation

2. Hands-on experience with tools such as Nanobanana, Arcads, and similar AI creative platforms

3. Ability to generate AI UGC-style videos and product B-roll

4. Experience refining outputs through prompt iteration

5. Understanding of how to integrate AI-generated assets into high-converting ad creatives



Requirements:



1. Proven experience editing e-commerce or direct-response ads

2. Strong understanding of retention, pacing, and conversion-focused storytelling

3. Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, or similar tools

4. Deep understanding of TikTok-style and native-looking ad formats

5. Ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines

6. Strong attention to detail and creative problem-solving

7. To ensure you have read this entire job post, you MUST include the phrase "DR DOOM" in your cover letter title or
 subject line.

8. Willingness to learn new tools, trends, and evolving AI technologies



Character & Mindset:



1. Performance-oriented and results-driven

2. Proactive and self-motivated

3. Open to feedback and fast iteration

4. Strong communicator and team player

5. Adaptable in a fast-paced environment

6. Hungry to grow and continuously improve skills



How to Apply:

Please submit your resume and portfolio/reels specifically highlighting your short-form direct response ads, along with a brief video introduction of yourself and an explanation of your experience with AI video tools.

title: Lead Qualification & Appointment Setter (Voice + CRM)
description:
About the Role



We’re an international football coaching and consulting team supporting clients around the world.

We’re looking for a Male Virtual Assistant / Appointment Setter with excellent English communication skills and a confident, natural accent to handle client calls, qualify leads, and manage CRM updates.



You’ll be speaking directly with potential clients, following up on leads, and helping schedule appointments with our coaching team. 



Key Responsibilities

- Call & communicate with potential leads

- Qualify and follow up with inbound and outbound leads.

- Schedule appointments using Calendly and update our CRM system.

- Handle client support via voice calls,
, or chat.

- Keep records organized and up to date.

- Coordinate with the coaching team to ensure smooth communication.



Requirements

- Excellent spoken and written English; neutral or Western accent preferred.

- Previous experience in appointment setting, lead management, or customer service.

- Reliable internet, noise-canceling headset, and quiet workspace.

- Comfortable using tools like Google Workspace, Slack, Zoom, and ClickUp.

- Organized, confident, and proactive communicator.



Nice to Have

Why Join Us

- Be part of a growing international sports brand.

- Support a motivated and collaborative remote team.

- Long-term position with opportunities for growth and training.

title: YouTube Video Editor|CONTRACT WORK  - *FAST WEEKLY PAY*
description:
Are you looking for FAST WEEKLY PAY? We are HIRING IMMEDIATELY. Please read the full description before applying.



Please attach a google drive link with YOUR TOP 3 LONG FORM YouTube videos edited (DON'T SEND SHORT FORM). We will judge your edits off of these 3 edits, so please send over your best work. Please be sure that the link you provide can be shared. 



PLEASE ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS WHEN APPLYING. 



Can you edit at least 3 long-form videos every week?

What editing software do you use?

Do you have reliable access to the internet? What is your internet speed?

Are you willing to do a paid test edit?



If you send your portfolio along with answers to the questions above, we will PRIORITIZE your application and you will have a higher chance of getting a spot.



JOB DESCRIPTION

We are 2 Filipino entrepreneurs looking to bring on an associate for our company. You will get paid $25 per video and $5 per short-form video. We pay every week, so this position is great for people who can edit quick high quality videos and need money ASAP.



If you do good work, then you have the potential to come on full time and get paid more money and consistent pay every week.



Some associates on our team are doing 4 long-form videos a week with multiple shorts so you can make up to $400+ USD (22,000 PHP+) monthly if you are consistent and can edit good videos. If you do more videos, we will pay you more.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ABOUT US

We are two Filipino Entrepreneurs looking for additional creative video editors for our YouTube Media Marketing Company (Real Estate Niche). We have ONE SPOT that just recently opened up and are trying to fill it FAST.



The culture that we've built within our team is like a family. We are all Filipino and can understand Tagalog and Bisaya but we prefer English.



Currently, we have an expert media department that has been with us long term. We work with top talent, and we handle over 20+ real estate clients all over the United States.



POTENTIAL

You have the potential to make as much as you want if you can provide great value. We usually hire somebody FAST within 2 - 4 days of the ad going up. If you can still see this AD, then the job is still available.



REQUIREMENTS

You will be required to edit 2 - 4 long form  videos every week, including thumbnails. Our Head of media will provide you with video templates to make things easier. You will need to cut both audio and video while adding b-roll content.



You must be proficient in Video Editing & Photoshop.



We're looking for somebody who is teachable and can work very fast, so if you are a quick learner and can perform the tasks that we ask, you will be compensated very well. What are you waiting for? APPLY NOW because interviews get booked and we hire FAST (Usually within 2-4 days) There is HUGE upside potential. Again, the salary stated in the application is only STARTING SALARY. You have the potential to make as much as you want if you can provide great value.



IF YOU CAN'T DO A ZOOM VIDEO INTERVIEW THEN DO NOT APPLY, WE HAVE GOTTEN MANY APPLICANTS AND ARE VERY PICKY WITH WHO WE WILL HIRE SO PLEASE BE READY.

title: Fundraising Campaign Manager/Graphics Designer
description:
Gride Technology is seeking a highly creative and results-driven Fundraising Campaign Manager / Graphics Designer to lead the planning, design, execution, and management of digital fundraising campaigns. This role combines strategic fundraising expertise with professional graphic design and video production skills to create compelling campaigns that attract donors, investors, and supporters.

The ideal candidate has proven experience managing fundraising campaigns for non-profit and for-profit organizations, particularly on crowdfunding platforms such as Indiegogo and Kickstarter, and is capable of producing high-quality visual and multimedia content that drives engagement and conversions.



Key Responsibilities

Fundraising Campaign Strategy & Management

• Plan, develop, and manage end-to-end crowdfunding campaigns.

• Design campaign structures, goals, timelines, and reward strategies.

• Create compelling fundraising narratives and value propositions.

• Monitor campaign performance and optimize conversion strategies.

• Coordinate campaign launches, updates, and promotional activities.

• Analyze fundraising metrics and produce performance reports.



Graphic Design & Visual Content Production

• Design campaign pages, promotional materials, and branding assets.

• Produce professional graphics for digital marketing, social media, and presentations.

• Create visual storytelling content that supports fundraising messaging.

• Ensure brand consistency across all visual communication channels.



Video Production & Editing

• Produce and edit promotional videos for fundraising campaigns.

• Develop campaign introduction videos, testimonials, and updates.

• Optimize video content for online platforms and audience engagement.



Digital Marketing & Campaign Promotion

• Support campaign visibility through coordinated digital marketing efforts.

• Collaborate with marketing teams on content distribution strategies.

• Assist with audience targeting and engagement initiatives.



Portfolio & Project Management

• Video editing tools (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar).

• Campaign analytics and reporting tools.

• Digital content management platforms.



Preferred Qualifications

• Experience in startup, technology, or growth-stage environments.

• Strong understanding of donor psychology and conversion strategies.



Key Competencies

• Creativity and visual storytelling excellence

• Strategic thinking and execution discipline

• Results-driven campaign management

• Attention to detail and brand consistency

• Ability to meet deadlines in fast-paced environments

title: VA Mortgage Operations Assistant
description:
???? Kickstart Your Mortgage Career from Home!

Join Us as a Mortgage Operations Associate (Virtual Assistant)

Are you detail-oriented, organized, and eager to grow your career in the mortgage industry—all from the comfort of your home?

We’re looking for a Mortgage Operations Associate (VA) to help streamline our backend operations, ensure accurate loan documentation, and provide vital administrative support to our mortgage team.

This is a great opportunity for someone with strong administrative or financial experience who thrives in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment and values the flexibility of remote work.



---

- Track deadlines and follow up on outstanding documents or signatures

- Prepare and organize files for underwriting and closing

- Manage
s and general administrative tasks with professionalism

---

- Highly organized with strong time management skills

---

???? Why Join Us?

---

? Ready to Get Started?

Apply now and take the next step in your virtual assistant career with us!

title: Cold Caller/Appointment Setter
description:
Appointment Setter / Cold Caller (Part-Time | Remote | Night Shift PH)



We are looking for a reliable, disciplined, and professional appointment setter to join our team.



Your main responsibility will be cold calling U.S. law firms that handle motor vehicle accident cases and booking qualified phone appointments for our team.



This role is simple, structured, and performance-focused. We value clear communication, consistency, and accountability.



?



Requirements

    •    Fluent in spoken and written English

    •    Clear speaking voice and confident communication skills

    •    Responds to messages in a timely manner

    •    Strong and stable internet connection

    •    Quiet background with minimal noise

    •    Efficient with time and able to stay focused during calling hours

    •    Disciplined and dependable

    •    Able to follow instructions carefully

    •    Organized and detail-oriented

    •    Familiar with Quo dialer or willing to learn quickly



Confidence, charisma, and the ability to connect with clients over the phone.

Proven experience in phone sales and client closing.

Reliable, responsible, and dedicated to achieving results.



?



Schedule

    •    Monday – Thursday

    •    10:30 PM – 12:00 AM Philippine Time



?



Responsibilities

    •    Cold call U.S. law firms that handle motor vehicle accident cases

    •    Speak professionally and confidently with decision-makers

    •    Invite them to schedule a call with our team

    •    Set the appointment live over the phone using our calendar system

    •    Track call outcomes and follow instructions closely



?



How to Apply



To be considered:

    1.    Write the word “CALLER” at the very top of your cover letter

(Applications without this will be ignored.)

    2.    Send a voice recording with call samples so we can clearly hear your English speaking ability.

    3.    Briefly describe any cold calling or appointment setting experience, especially with U.S. businesses, if applicable.



?



We are looking for someone long-term, reliable, and easy to communicate with.

If you are disciplined, organized, and take pride in your work, we would love to hear from you.

title: QA Engineer (Manual + Automation)
description:
And Studio + LIVE AI

About the Role



We’re looking for a QA Engineer to help us ensure high-quality releases across multiple web apps and AI-powered SaaS platforms. You’ll own QA execution (manual and automation), improve testing processes, and collaborate closely with our Project Manager and developers to prevent regressions and ship confidently.



This role is ideal if you enjoy a fast-moving environment, clear ownership, and building better systems—not just clicking through checklists.



What You’ll Work On



Performing manual QA across web applications (feature testing, regression testing, cross-browser testing)

Creating and maintaining test plans, test cases, and QA checklists in ClickUp

Writing clear, actionable bug reports with steps to reproduce, expected vs actual results, screenshots/video, and environment details

Collaborating with devs to validate fixes and ensure issues are truly resolved (including re-tests + regression checks)

Supporting release cycles by verifying “ready for deploy” criteria and post-deploy smoke tests

Helping us improve QA workflows and documentation (SOPs, definitions of done, acceptance criteria templates)

Automation QA (Strongly Preferred)

If you have automation experience, you’ll also help with:

Building and maintaining automated test suites (end-to-end and/or integration tests)

Setting up a practical automation approach that matches our stack and shipping speed

Running automated checks in CI when possible and keeping the suite stable and useful

(Nice) Reviewing or validating code changes from a QA perspective (risk spotting, edge cases)

Typical Projects You’ll Touch

AI knowledge bases and chatbot experiences

Client marketing websites + landing pages

Multi-tenant SaaS platforms

Integrations and workflows (e.g., CRMs, forms,
 sequences, automation tools)

Tools / Environment

ClickUp (task management, acceptance criteria, QA tracking)

GitHub (PRs, issues, collaboration)

Common web stack: React / Next.js, APIs, databases (varies by project)

Automation tools may include (depending on your experience): Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, or similar

(If you have a preferred automation stack, tell us what you’d use and why.)



Requirements

2+ years experience in QA testing for web applications (manual required)

Strong ability to write clear bug reports and communicate professionally async

Comfortable validating work against acceptance criteria and spotting edge cases

Organized and consistent: you keep test artifacts clean, updated, and reusable

High ownership: you follow issues through from discovery ? fix validation ? release confidence

Nice to Have

Automation QA experience (end-to-end tests, regression suites, CI runs)

Ability to inspect logs/network requests and do basic debugging

Familiarity with modern web apps (React/Next.js), APIs, and databases

Experience working with SaaS products, multi-tenant apps, or AI features

Experience collaborating with distributed teams across time zones

Reporting / Collaboration

You’ll work closely with our Project Manager / QA Lead (Micaella)

You’ll collaborate with developers daily to validate fixes and prevent rework

You’ll help us level up our quality systems—not just test outcomes





About Us

And Studio is a fast-growing digital agency and AI SaaS company, founded in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about "Yes AND Both."

Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:

Start Small, Dream Big

Living ---------- (Integrity & authenticity)

Prioritize People Over Projects

Make it Count

Find a Way & TEA (Test Every Assumption)

Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity

Engagement Details

Contract role: ~35–40 hours/week (flexible depending on fit and workload)

Remote — async-friendly with some overlap for check-ins

Competitive rate based on experience

Potential for long-term engagement based on performance and team needs



How to Apply

Send your application with:



Subject line: I Want to Work at And Studio - QA Engineer - [Your Full Name]

Include:



Brief intro (2–3 sentences max): why you want the role + why you’re a fit) - Video

Link to LinkedIn and/or portfolio (if applicable)

If you have automation experience: link to GitHub or examples of test work

Your availability (hours/week, timezone)

Hourly rate expectations

Short intro video about you and your QA experience

 to:  

 If selected, a short Google Meet video call will be required.

title: Frontend Designer & Logo Designer
description:
Frontend Designer & Logo Designer



We are on the lookout for a talented Frontend Designer & Logo Designer with a strong ability to think strategically and execute visually. If you have a passion for building brands from the ground up—combining positioning, messaging, and design into cohesive systems—we’d love to meet you! Please share samples of your work by including either a portfolio or links to live brand, design, or web projects with your application.



Responsibilities:



Develop brand strategies including positioning, messaging frameworks, and brand narratives.



Translate brand strategy into visual identity systems (logos, color palettes, typography, visual language).



Design brand and marketing assets for digital platforms (websites, landing pages, presentations, social media).



Collaborate with internal teams to ensure strategic and visual consistency across all touchpoints.



Support project management efforts and ensure timely delivery of brand and design projects.



Present brand concepts and design directions clearly to internal teams and clients.



Requirements:



Proven experience as a Brand Strategist, Brand Designer, or similar hybrid role with at least three years of work experience.



Strong portfolio demonstrating both strategic thinking and high-quality design execution.



Proficiency in Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, or equivalent design tools.



Strong understanding of branding, visual systems, and storytelling.



Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.



Keen attention to detail.



Strong design and front-end visual sensibility.



Familiarity with web design, UI/UX principles, and digital-first branding is a plus.



Experience working with startups, agencies, or purpose-driven organizations is a plus.



Strong project management skills and the ability to work as part of a team.



About Us:



We are a fast-growing and innovative company, founded on the principle of bridging the gap between businesses and their customers. And Studio was established in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about “Yes AND Both.”



Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:



Start Small, Dream Big: We believe in the power of small beginnings leading to great achievements.



Living
 We value integrity and authenticity in every aspect of life.



Prioritize People Over Projects: We cherish people and their contributions above all else.



Make it Count: We focus on what truly matters.



Find a Way & TEA (Test Every Assumption): We believe in persistence and continuous improvement.



Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity



We are looking for someone who is excited about being part of a project from start to finish and who can bring strong strategic thinking and project ownership to our team. If our values resonate with you and you’re looking for a long-term collaboration, we would love to hear from you!



Application Instructions:



Change the subject line to:

“I Want to Work at And Studio – Brand Strategist & Designer – [Your Full Name Here]”



Start your message with 2–3 sentences on why you would like this position and why you are a good fit. Keep it concise; applications with longer introductions will be deleted.



Send an intro video about you and your experience via
 to our Operations Director:





We are offering a fantastic job opportunity with potential for bonuses and raises. Only applicants who follow these instructions will be considered. If selected, a short Google Video Meet call with video will be required.



Thank you,

And Studio



Note: A potential opportunity for a full-time role will be offered to accepted applicants, based on project performance.

title: Lead Developer
description:
Lead Developer

React / n8n / Supabase — Contract Role with Team Leadership

And Studio + LIVE AI



About the Role

We're looking for a Lead Developer to drive technical direction across our AI-powered SaaS platforms and web applications. You'll work with a small team of contractors to ship features for clients and internal products—restaurant management tools, AI knowledge bases, and coaching platforms. This role combines hands-on development with mentoring junior developers and making architectural decisions.

Leading technical decisions and architecture across multiple projects

Mentoring and code-reviewing work from junior/mid-level developers

Building complex features in React/Next.js with TypeScript

Designing database schemas and implementing Row-Level Security in Supabase

Creating and optimizing n8n workflows for API orchestration

Owning the technical roadmap for product features

Communicating technical trade-offs to non-technical stakeholders

Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

Tools: GitHub, ClickUp, Vercel, Retool

4+ years experience with React/Next.js and TypeScript

Strong PostgreSQL skills including schema design, query optimization, and RLS

Experience with Supabase, Firebase, or similar BaaS platforms

Strong code review skills and ability to set technical standards

Ability to break down complex projects into manageable tasks

Excellent communication skills—comfortable explaining technical concepts to non-technical tea
mbers

And Studio is a fast-growing digital agency and AI SaaS company, founded in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about "Yes AND Both."

Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:

Start Small, Dream Big: We believe in the power of small beginnings leading to great achievements.

Living

Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity

About the Role

We're looking for a Full Stack Developer to help build AI-powered SaaS platforms and web applications for small businesses and churches. You'll work across multiple projects—from restaurant management tools to AI knowledge bases to coaching platforms. If you enjoy variety, owning features end-to-end, and working with a small team that ships fast, this could be a great fit.



What You'll Work On

Building responsive React/Next.js interfaces with TypeScript

Creating backend workflows and API integrations using n8n

Working with Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Edge Functions, Row-Level Security)

Implementing multi-tenant SaaS architecture patterns

Integrating third-party APIs (Square, Stripe, AI/LLM services)

Shipping features from database schema to polished UI



Tech Stack

Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage, Edge Functions)

Automation: n8n for workflow orchestration and API routes

Integrations: Square, Stripe, AI/LLM APIs

Tools: GitHub, ClickUp, Vercel



Requirements

2+ years experience with React/Next.js and TypeScript

Solid understanding of PostgreSQL and relational database design

Experience with Supabase, Firebase, or similar BaaS platforms

Comfortable working across the full stack (frontend and backend)

Strong communication skills and ability to work async with a distributed team

Self-directed with good judgment on when to ask for help



Nice to Have

Experience with n8n or similar workflow automation tools

Familiarity with AI/LLM integrations (RAG, embeddings, vector search)

Multi-tenant SaaS architecture experience

Background in church tech, ministry tools, or faith-based organizations

Experience with Square, Stripe, or POS integrations



About Us

And Studio is a fast-growing digital agency and AI SaaS company, founded in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about "Yes AND Both."

Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:

Start Small, Dream Big: We believe in the power of small beginnings leading to great achievements.

Living
 We value integrity and authenticity in every aspect of life.

Prioritize People Over Projects: We cherish people and their contributions above all else.

Make it Count: We focus on what truly matters.

Find a Way & TEA (Test Every Assumption): We believe in persistence and continuous improvement.

Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity



Engagement Details

Contract role: 35-40 hours/week

Remote — async-friendly with some overlap for standups

Competitive rate based on experience

Potential for bonuses, raises, and long-term engagement



How to Apply



Send your application with:

Subject line: "I Want to Work at And Studio - Full Stack Developer - [Your Full Name]"

Brief intro (2-3 sentences max): Why you want this position and why you're a good fit. Keep it concise—longer introductions will be skipped.

Link to GitHub or portfolio showing relevant work

Your availability (hours/week, timezone)

Hourly rate expectations

Short intro video about you and your experience

 to: 
 & 

If selected, a short Google Meet video call will be required.

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe : Office Admin Role for E-Commerce ! Join the Beat !
description:
- Recruitment validity period: Until 3 business days from the date of the first recruitment announcement

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a “Full-Time” Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Sales & Marketing

You will be responsible for studying and trying how to gain traffics to our shopping mall. Active working on research articles related to SEO, social marketing and finding where and how to promote our shopping mall is required.

4. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

* ONLY Looking for a full time employee

* $300~$400/mo. determined based on the candidate’s skills, experience, and overall evaluation relative to other applicants

* One-year renewable Contract

- Compensation and terms may be adjusted based on attendance, teamwork, and performance.

- Exceptional performers may be considered for early renewal or adjustment. (multiple successful cases)

* 6-month probationary period with possibility of early conversion to regular position based on performance (multiple successful cases)



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

3. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year’s Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

4. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1-Year Service / 3-Year Service / 5-Year Service



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

Summitree

title: Meta Ads Specialist
description:
About the Role

We’re looking for a highly capable Senior Meta Ads Specialist to take ownership of paid social performance across a portfolio of client accounts.



You’ll manage campaigns in Meta Ads Manager 
 & Instagram), analyse results, and continuously test and optimise to improve outcomes such as leads, revenue, and profitable growth. This role suits someone who enjoys working hands-on in the ad account, understands how to scale responsibly, and can communicate performance clearly and confidently.



This is a part-time contractor role with flexibility and autonomy. You’ll be trusted to manage your workload independently and deliver results without micromanagement.



What You’ll Do

- Plan, launch, and optimise campaigns in Meta Ads Manager 
 & Instagram)

- Build clear campaign structures (audiences, placements, budget allocation, testing frameworks)

- Improve CPA/ROAS through ongoing optimisation and structured experimentation

- Analyse performance data and identify growth opportunities

- Develop and maintain testing roadmaps (creative, audiences, offers, landing page alignment)

- Monitor budget pacing and scaling decisions

- Collaborate with creative teams and provide clear creative direction and feedback

- Ensure tracking and attribution are accurate

- Deliver clear monthly reporting and concise weekly updates with actionable insights

- Support broader social execution where required (e.g., coordinating creative requirements or light scheduling)



What You’ll Bring

- 6+ years’ experience managing Meta Ads campaigns end-to-end

- Proven success running performance campaigns (lead gen and/or eCommerce)

- Strong understanding of targeting, optimisation, and scaling strategies

- Confident interpreting data and making commercial decisions

- Comfortable managing multiple accounts at once

- Excellent written communication and clear reporting style

- Proactive, organised, and self-directed working style



Nice to Have

- Experience across both B2B lead generation and eCommerce

- Familiarity with tracking tools and attribution concepts

- Experience collaborating with designers and copywriters

- Understanding of landing page optimisation / CRO basics

- Experience with scheduling tools (helpful, not required)



What Success Looks Like

- Consistent, active optimisation across accounts

- Stable or improving CPA/ROAS performance

- Structured testing and sensible scaling decisions

- Clear communication with practical, actionable insights

- Reliable reporting and strong account hygiene



Why This Role Appeals

- Flexible part-time hours

- Remote work with minimal meetings

- High trust and autonomy

- Opportunity to work across a variety of client accounts

- Long-term potential for the right person



If you’re an experienced Meta Ads specialist who enjoys improving performance, spotting patterns in data, and taking ownership of outcomes, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Affiliate Manager
description:
Job Description:



Full-Time | Work From Home | Ecommerce & Influencer Partnerships



SRI Labs is a fast-growing, premium beauty & wellness ecommerce brand known for high-end skincare, hair tools, and breakthrough consumer products. We’re looking for a driven, organized, and relationship-focused Affiliate Manager to lead and scale our affiliate program across platforms like ShopMy, Levanta, and key influencer networks.



If you love partnering with creators, optimizing affiliate performance, and helping a brand grow through relationships — this is the role for you.



What You’ll Do



As our Affiliate Manager, you will own the entire affiliate ecosystem and work directly with the CEO and marketing leadership team to scale creator-led revenue.



Key Responsibilities



Manage and optimize SRI Labs’ affiliate program across ShopMy, Levanta, and other affiliate platforms.

Recruit, vet, and onboard new affiliates, creators, and influencers that align with our brand.

Build strong long-term relationships with partners to drive consistent revenue and brand growth.

Track performance, payouts, ROI, and ensure all affiliates are supported with assets, codes, and campaigns.

Coordinate affiliate-driven launches, seasonal promotions, and strategic campaigns.

Identify top performers and build incentive strategies to maximize their output.

Maintain reporting dashboards and communicate results to leadership weekly.

Collaborate with internal marketing, product, design, and operations teams to support affiliate needs.

Continuously test new platforms, creators, strategies, and incentives to grow revenue.

Who You Are



We’re looking for someone who is:



Based in the Philippines

Experienced in affiliate, influencer marketing, or digital partnerships (1–3+ years preferred).

Organized, reliable, and able to manage many creators and campaigns at once.

Strong at relationship-building — someone affiliates love to work with.

Comfortable working within platforms like ShopMy, Levanta, Impact, or similar tools.

Data-driven with excellent follow-through and communication skills.

Hungry, proactive, and passionate about helping a brand grow.

Why Join SRI Labs?



Remote work

Work directly with a high-performing founding team

Competitive salary based on experience

Long-term growth potential within a fast-scaling ecommerce company

Supportive, positive culture built around speed, innovation, and passion for great products

Opportunity to make a big impact — your work will directly drive revenue and brand expansion

How to Apply



 your resume and a quick 2–3 sentence introduction 



Subject Line: Affiliate Manager – [Your Name]



Include:



Links to affiliate programs or creators you’ve worked with

Any relevant platforms/tools you’ve used

Your expected monthly salary (in PHP)

Job Type: Full-time

title: Part-Time Receptionist
description:
nsurance Professionals is a well-established U.S.-based insurance agency that has been operating for years and continues to grow every year.



We currently have 20+ Virtual Assistants working with our company across different departments including reception, quoting, customer service, cold calling, and marketing support. Many of our tea
mbers have been with us long-term because we prioritize stability, clear expectations, strong leadership, and real benefits.



We are not a temporary project or short-term contract company. We are building a structured, long-term team.



We believe our Virtual Assistants are a critical part of our success. That’s why we offer a competitive benefits package, consistent schedules, and opportunities to grow within the company.



If you’re looking for stability, structure, and leadership that values your work — you’ll fit in well here.



We are seeking a professional, friendly, and reliable Part-Time Receptionist to answer inbound calls and support our growing agency.



You will be the first impression of our company. Professionalism, clarity in communication, and dependability are essential.



Answer inbound calls professionally and confidently



Route calls to the correct department or tea
mber



Take detailed messages when needed



Provide basic information to clients regarding policies and services



Document call notes accurately in our system



Support light administrative tasks as needed



Schedule



4 hours per day



Qualifications



Excellent English communication skills (clear speaking voice required)



Friendly, confident, and professional phone presence



Reliable high-speed internet connection



Quiet workspace with no background noise



Strong attention to detail

2:00 PM – 6:00 PM MST



Monday through Friday



Reliable attendance is required



Compensation & Benefits



We believe in rewarding our team and supporting their long-term success.



 Health Insurance – Medical Stipend Program



Up to 100,000 PHP per year toward your chosen health insurance policy



Eligible after 90 days of employment



Choose your own provider and add beneficiaries if desired



 Internet Allowance



PHP 1,500 per month



 Rice Allowance



PHP 1,000 per month



13th Month Pay



Equivalent to 1 Month Base Pay



Paid annually on your work anniversary



Paid Time Off (PTO)



1 Week Paid Vacation Leave



1 Week Paid Family/Sick Leave



Use it or lose it — we encourage rest and family time



 Tuition Reimbursement



Up to 50,000 PHP annually



Can be used for your education or a family member’s



Who This Role Is Perfect For



Someone looking for stable part-time hours



A dependable professional who enjoys phone communication



A team player who takes pride in doing things the right way



Someone looking for long-term employment — not just a short contract

title: nsurance Claims & Operations Coordinator — Construction / Restoration
description:
We are a U.S.-based construction and restoration company specializing in fire and water damage insurance rebuilds. We are seeking a highly organized and professional Insurance Claims & Operations Coordinator to support daily business operations.



This is a long-term, full-time position with consistent work for the right candidate.



Primary responsibilities include:



• Sending contracts to homeowners and tracking signatures  

• Scheduling inspections, site visits, and appointments  

• Following up with insurance adjusters regarding claim status and supplements  

• Managing
 communication with homeowners and insurance companies  

• Tracking multiple projects and maintaining organized records  

• Providing regular updates on job status  

• Handling administrative tasks to keep projects moving forward  



The ideal candidate:



• Has experience with insurance claims, construction, property management, or similar fields  

• Is highly organized and detail-oriented  

• Communicates professionally in written and spoken English  

• Is persistent with follow-ups and deadlines  

• Is comfortable making phone calls to U.S. clients and insurance representatives if needed  

• Can work during U.S. business hours (Eastern Time)  



Experience with property insurance claims, restoration companies, or estimating software (Xactimate) is a strong advantage but not required.



We are looking for someone reliable who wants a long-term role and an opportunity to grow with our company.

title: Skilled Video Editor for Ecommerce Ads
description:
Hello Everyone

We are looking for a skilled E-commerce Video Editor to join our team long-term. This is a high-volume role where you will turn our scripts into high-quality video ads. We provide the 100% finished scripts and clear guidance for every single ad—you just need to bring the visual side to life.



Some videos will be very simple "assembly" tasks, while others will require your marketing eye and creativity to make them stand out.



What You Will Do

AI Avatars: Use tools like HeyGen to create AI-generated presenters for our ads.



Editing & B-Roll: Add clips and B-roll to the script. We provide some footage, but you must be able to find the rest using Envato Elements.



High Output: You must be fast and efficient, producing a minimum of 5 high-quality videos per day.



Translation & AI: Use Claude/Gemini to help with translations and AI tools for natural voiceovers.Also important for you to understand the script, to be able to select accurate brolls and clips. 



Problem Solving: You are autonomous. You know how to use AI to solve tasks you don't fully understand and you aren't afraid to ask for help when needed. You should be willing to learn, we will train you



Requirements

E-commerce Experience: You are NOT a beginner. you have a portfolio of high-quality e-commerce or dropshipping ads.



Proficient with Tools: Experience with Envato, AI Video tools (like HeyGen), and standard editing software (CapCut/Premiere).



Quality First: Even for "simple" videos, the quality must be very good. We do not accept low-quality work.



Growth Mindset: We have hundreds of ads as references to teach you our style. We want someone who wants to learn, grow, and move into higher leadership roles with us. If you have any questions, we will be happy to answer them.



Contact:

title: Recruitment Outbound Caller | $1000 + Bonus
description:
We’re hiring a Recruitment Outbound Caller to contact candidates, pre-screen them, and book confirmed interviews for our U.S.-based insurance district.



This is a phone-focused role. If you’re confident on calls, comfortable handling objections, and motivated by booking appointments, this may be a great fit.



• Compensation & Details

• Base Pay: $1000/month

• Performance Bonus: Uncapped (details shared during onboarding)

• Schedule: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM Mountain Time

• Type: Full-time, long-term

• Commitment: No other active jobs



What You’ll Do

• Make outbound calls to candidates daily

• Pre-screen applicants and assess interest and availability

• Book and confirm interview appointments

• Follow up to reduce no-shows

• Update basic candidate notes and status



Requirements

1. Strong experience in cold calling or appointment setting

2. Clear, confident English communication

3. Comfortable handling high call volume

4. Organized with follow-ups and tracking

5. Able to work independently and meet booking targets

6. Recruitment experience is a plus, but strong phone skills are required.



About Us

We are a top-performing insurance district in Colorado building a long-term team of reliable Filipino VAs who take ownership and deliver results.



How to Apply

Please send:

1. A short summary of your cold calling or appointment-setting experience

2. Tools or dialers you’ve used

3. Confirmation of full-time availability



Applicants with strong phone experience will be prioritized.

title: Recruitment Appointment Setter (Phone-Based) | Full-Time | $1000
description:
We’re hiring a Recruitment Outreach & Appointment Setting Specialist to handle phone-based candidate engagement and help move applicants forward in our hiring process.



This role is focused on calling candidates, confirming interest, and booking interviews. It is not a strategy or management role — it’s a hands-on, execution-focused position.



• Pay: $1000/month

• Bonus: Performance-based bonus (details shared with qualified candidates)

• Schedule: Full-time, fixed Mountain Time hours (9am–5pm MT)

• Work Setup: Remote

• Commitment: Full-time only (no other active jobs)



What You’ll Do

• Make outbound calls to candidates

• Pre-screen applicants for interest, availability, and communication skills

• Book and confirm interview appointments

• Follow up with candidates to reduce no-shows

• Keep basic candidate notes and status updates



What We’re Looking For

• Strong phone and appointment-setting experience

• Clear, confident, and professional communication

• Comfortable speaking with candidates throughout the day

• Organized and reliable with follow-ups

• Able to work independently and meet outreach goals



This role is a good fit if you:

1. Enjoy phone-based work

How to Apply

Please include:

1. A short summary of your phone or appointment-setting experience

2. Any exposure to recruitment or candidate outreach

3. Confirmation you can work full-time Mountain Time hours



Applicants with strong phone experience will be prioritized.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant
description:
PLEASE READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION BEFORE APPLYING.



We are seeking a proactive, detail-oriented Executive Virtual Assistant to support our leadership team. You will be the "right hand" to our executive, managing operations and ensuring our CRM stays organized during US Business Hours.



Key Responsibilities:

-Manage executive calendars and schedule meetings across US time zones.

-Handle
 correspondence and act as a primary point of contact.

-Maintain and update our GoHighLevel (GHL) CRM, including pipelines and basic workflow management.

-Prepare daily reports and track project milestones.

-Coordinate internal tasks to ensure no balls are dropped.

-High level of discretion, ability to anticipate needs, especially in a fast-paced environments.



Requirements:

Ability to handle after-hours emergencies.

title: Products & Collections Lister – Shopify Dropshipping (Fashion niche)
description:
Location: Remote





Job Type



Full-time or Part-time

• 4–8 hours per day. Workload may vary depending on product launches and store needs

• Minimum 6 days/week



Commitment: Long-term position (3+ months)





About Us



We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating fashion dropshipping stores with hundreds of products and multiple collections launched every week.



We are looking for a highly detail-oriented Product & Collections Lister who understands fashion dropshipping and can efficiently manage product imports, optimization, and collection organization.



This role requires speed, precision, and strong Shopify knowledge.





Job Description



You will be responsible for importing and optimizing products and collections weekly while ensuring accuracy, proper pricing, translations, visuals, and collection structure.



You must be comfortable working with hundreds of products and making bulk edits efficiently.





Responsibilities



* Import one or multiple products and/or collections per day



* Use a prompt in Poky to import collections quickly



* Check and correct product translations



* Change product order inside collections based on competitor order



* Convert and modify prices in bulk using Hextom



* Correct spelling errors in bulk using Hextom



* Add size guides using BF Size Charts



* Check automatic discounts are properly working



* Add and modify theme templates to personalize product pages per collection



* Understand basic HTML to quickly identify and fix issues (formatting, design etc.)



* Use Shopify reports to identify our bestsellers and reorder collections



* Update product tags and internal product links



* Change product backgrounds colors in bulk using Photoroom



* Generate AI backgrounds using Higgsfield





Requirements



* Minimum 1 year of experience as a product & collection lister for a Shopify dropshipping business, including at least 3 months in the fashion niche



* Proven experience with:

* Shopify

* Hextom (Bulk Product Edit)

* Poky with prompts

* Slack or 

* Google Sheets

* DeepL & ChatGPT (for product translations)

* Photoroom

* Higgsfield (or other AI background tools)

We'll give you free access to all these tools



* Strong attention to detail



* Ability to work under daily deadlines



* Basic HTML knowledge (understanding formatting errors and theme edits)



* Experience managing hundreds of products



* Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal



* Highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive



* Ability to work independently without constant supervision



* Long-term mindset and reliability





Compensation



* $3/hour during the first 2 weeks (trial period)

* $4/hour after successful trial

* $5+/hour if promoted to Product Lister Manager



Payment bi-weekly or monthly.

Salary increases based on performance and responsibilities.





How to Apply



Please send your application before February 18 at 11:59 PM (Philippines time).



To confirm that you carefully read this job post, start your application message with the number “214”. Applications that do not follow this instruction will not be reviewed.

title: A/R Billing Collections Specialist
description:
Omni Therapy is currently looking to hire an experienced professional with experience in bookkeeping, billing and soft collections to handle payments and basic creation of ledgers and journals for work we do with home health agency partners. 



Duties and Responsibilities:

• Bill home health agencies using Devero, Filemaker, and QB (We fully train our new hires on the system we use).

• Apply payments using bank scanners, Filemaker, and QB.

You must have:

• Microsoft Excel experience.

• Night shift experience is a big plus.

• Experience in healthcare billing / collections is a big plus.



Benefits

• Guaranteed full-time employment - Mon - Fri, 9am-5:30pm PST

• Paid vacation

• Paid Holidays

• HMO Insurance

• Annual bonuses

title: Short-Form Video Editor (Chat-Based Storytelling Concept)
description:
We are looking for a creative and trend-aware short-form video editor to produce engaging Dutch-language social media content centered around chat-based storytelling.



The core concept:

Each video showcases a flirty conversation (Instagram, WhatsApp, etc.) where one person is trying to “rizz” the other. The progression of the conversation is visualized through a strong storytelling format (this can include sports clips, gaming visuals, cinematic moments, memes, or other creative metaphors). The editing should clearly reflect emotional shifts — wins, losses, tension, recovery — in an entertaining and highly engaging way.



These videos promote Taki AI, a digital wingman app that allows users to upload screenshots of their conversations and receive smart, flirty reply suggestions.



Important:

All videos must be in Dutch (subtitles, chat text, hooks). AI translation tools may be used, or we can provide the original conversations.



Responsibilities:

- Edit short-form vertical videos (TikTok / Instagram Reels format).

- Integrate DUTCH chat-style screenshots into compelling visual storytelling.

- Develop creative visual metaphors beyond football (sports, gaming, pop culture, cinematic scenes, etc.).

- Ensure the first 2–3 seconds capture attention.

- Maintain consistent branding and tone across videos.



Requirements:

- Proven experience with short-form viral content.

- Strong understanding of internet culture and Gen Z humor.

- Ability to create engaging narrative pacing from simple chat screenshots.

- Comfort working in Dutch (or using AI tools to localize properly).

- Reliable delivery and clear communication.



Nice to Have:

- Experience editing meme-style or storytelling content.

- Knowledge of dating culture and social media trends.

- Creative mindset for developing repeatable content formats.



If you can transform chat screenshots into addictive short-form content, we’d love to see your portfolio and ideas.



mail 
 for more info and example videos.

title: RECRUITING VA ($10 per hr) READ FULL JOB POST
description:
Role Overview



We are hiring two Operations Managers to build and oversee structured outreach pods.



This is an enforcement-based execution role.

You are not a strategist. You are responsible for structure, speed, accountability, and daily performance control.



You will recruit, manage, and enforce standards for up to 10 DM setters in a defined outreach system.



?



Core Responsibilities



You are responsible for:



• Recruiting and onboarding up to 10 DM setters

• Enforcing daily outreach quotas

• Removing underperformers the same day

• Collecting and verifying daily proof of work

• Submitting a standardized KPI summary report daily

• Maintaining operational discipline within your pod



This is a performance-focused role with measurable daily metrics.



?



Authority



You will have full operational authority within your pod.



You are authorized to:



• Remove setters the same day if they miss quota or proof requirements

• Replace setters immediately without approval

• Enforce the 4-hour proof-of-work rule

• Make enforcement decisions without waiting for escalation



Speed and clarity are essential.



?



Performance Standards



• Your pod must be fully staffed within 72 hours

• You must maintain a minimum of 6 active setters daily

• Any removed setter must be replaced within 24 hours

• Daily KPI reporting is required in structured numeric format

• Failure to maintain pod performance may result in replacement



This is a high-accountability environment with clear metrics.



?



Daily Reporting Format (Required)



Your end-of-day report must include:



• Active setters

• Total DMs sent

• Replies

• Booked calls

• Shows

• Closed deals

• Removed today

• Replacements onboarded



Reports must be numeric and structured. No long-form summaries.



?



Time & Availability Requirements



• Must overlap with U.S. business hours

• Same-day response required for enforcement decisions

• Must be available daily during the sprint period

• High-speed enforcement environment



Delays in response will impact pod performance.



?



Fraud Prevention & Quality Control



You are responsible for verifying:



• No fake logs

• No duplicate leads

• Spreadsheet entries are accurate

• Screenshot proof matches logged activity



Verification is required before approving work.



?



Hiring Channels



You will source and recruit setters through legal freelance and hiring platforms, including:



• OnlineJobs.ph

•
 groups

• Fiverr

• LinkedIn

• Other compliant freelance marketplaces



You are responsible for filtering and qualifying candidates.



?



Who This Role Is For



This role is for individuals who:



• Are comfortable enforcing rules

• Can make removal decisions without hesitation

• Can build a 10-person pod quickly

• Operate well under measurable performance metrics

• Are detail-oriented and disciplined



This is not a creative strategy role. It is an execution and control role.



?



Application Instructions (Mandatory)



To apply, send one message answering the following clearly:

 1. Do you understand this is an enforcement-based management role?

 2. Can you recruit and build a 10-person pod within 72 hours?

 3. Are you comfortable removing underperformers the same day without hesitation?



Only structured responses answering all three questions will be reviewed.

mbers on WordPress best practices.
